definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: The crime of abusing the power and position is a superinduced crime of Criminal Law.
sentences.chinese: 滥用职权罪是《刑法》新增设的罪名。

sentences.english: Metronomes should not be over used.
sentences.chinese: 节拍器也不应当被滥用。

sentences.english: Any judicial officer who abuses his power and commits the crime mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be given a heavier punishment.
sentences.chinese: 司法工作人员滥用职权，犯前款罪的，从重处罚。

sentences.english: Closed-cell foam withstands years of use and abuse.
sentences.chinese: 闭孔泡沫能够承受多年的使用和滥用。

sentences.english: HRN: Do you think a return to the gold standard would constrain government abuse?
sentences.chinese: 你认为一个标准的返回黄金将限制政府滥用？
违法分子经常滥用现代技术。

sentences.english: The realm of reproductive technology is unusually laissez-faire in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 在美国对待辅助生育技术的滥用持放任自流的态度。

sentences.english: FDA looks to curb abuse of cough medicine.
sentences.chinese: 美国FDA计划出台措施，遏止滥用止咳药。

sentences.english: The people were charged with mortgage-related misrepresentations and other criminal abuses. The F. B.
sentences.chinese: 这些人被控告抵押相关的欺诈和其它犯罪性质的滥用。

sentences.english: Lin, J. (2016). The Problem and countermeasures of synthetic drug abuse among adolescents in Macao.
sentences.chinese: 澳门在学青少年合成毒品滥用问题及对策研究。

sentences.english: And a clutch of counter-terrorism laws that were widely abused under Mr Mubarak will be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 一些在穆巴拉克执政期间广泛滥用的反恐法也将废除。

sentences.english: But now sponsors and advertisers are growing wary of association with a sport riven with drug abuse.
sentences.chinese: 现在赞助商和广告主终于对环法的药物滥用发难了。

sentences.english: Recently the government has been stepping up efforts to eradicate such abuses.
sentences.chinese: 近来，中国政府正着力根除这些滥用短信的行为。

sentences.english: Another tell-tale sign of misused on-camera flash is the dark tunnel effect.
sentences.chinese: 另一个滥用机顶闪光灯的典型是黑色背景效果。

sentences.english: V. How can Anti-monopoly Law Regulate the Court of Law for Abuse of Power?
sentences.chinese: 反垄断法如何规制法院权力滥用？

sentences.english: Of all the lofty practices, it is the most abused.
sentences.chinese: 这是所有崇高行为中被滥用最多的。

definition: to prohibit the use of sth/to ban/(computing) to disable
